Name: Industriality
About the game: INDUSTRIALITY is a 2D Platformer - side-view shooter. Future, Robots have invaded the planet and terrorized cities. Artificial intelligence is out of control. Only the Hero can stop this madness. The goal of the Hero is to get to the main computer and turn it off, thereby incapacitating all robots. Several types of robots, with different behaviors and different types of attacks.
